Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that a CNN journalist of the year was fired for creating fake news stories, when in fact it was a different journalist from a different publication who was fired.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement that a CNN journalist of the year was fired for creating fake news stories.

Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists for the claim, which is that the image of Jim Acosta is purposely used to deceive readers and bait them into clicking on the article, as mentioned in the expert's verdict.
